channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- reCAPTCHA Jetpack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- reCAPTCHA Jetpack

item.title: CVE-2024-3941|2024-05-10T06:00:02.776Z -- Unknown -- reCAPTCHA Jetpack
item.description: The reCAPTCHA Jetpack WordPress plugin through 0.2.2 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged-in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-3940|2024-05-10T06:00:02.589Z -- Unknown -- reCAPTCHA Jetpack
item.description: The reCAPTCHA Jetpack WordPress plugin through 0.2.2 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
